snippet: On Tuesday, the pianist Jeremy Denk will be awarded the Avery Fisher Prize for musicianship and contributions to the musical world.
abstract: Pianist Jeremy Denk's career has hit some high notes over past year; in addition to signing book deal and being named MacArthur Fellow and Musical America's 'instrumentalist of the year', he has also won $75,000 Avery Fisher Prize; will also premiere his comic opera The Classical Style at Ojai Music Festival in California.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, the pianist Jeremy Denk will be awarded the Avery Fisher Prize for musicianship and contributions to the musical world.

headline.seo: Jeremy Denk Is to Receive the Avery Fisher Prize
headline.main: String of High Notes for Pianist
headline.print_headline: String of High Notes for Pianist
